response.job_title:
M. Eng. Chemical Engineering (Sorbonne Université).
Process engineer, quality assurance, and R&D
response.summary: Chemical engineer experienced in Quality Management / HSE, R&D and technical support, currently studying “Chemical Engineering Master” at Sorbonne Université (Paris VI), with emphasis in R&D, chemical and environmental risk management, marketing and process control.
response.skills: Leadership, Travail d'équipe, capacité d'analyse, orientation vers les résultats, service à la clientèle, Investigación, Innovación en productos, Ingeniería, Integración de equipos

profile_positions.title: Superviseur de l’amélioration et de la productivité

profile_positions.description:
- Define, implement, and sustain the mechanisms for controlling the production process to ensure compliance with regulations and specifications
- Lead groups dedicated to the analysis and effective resolution of complaints and non-conformities
- Carry out audits in plants and quality laboratories, to assess and improve the level of compliance with applicable standards and norms (GMP, ISO 17025, FSSC 22000)
✓ Nonconformity Product reduction in 75% vs 2017
✓ Implementation of on-site indicators using DMS methodology
✓ Participation in production cost reduction projects using CAP-Do methodology
profile_positions.title: Quality responsible

profile_positions.description:
- Formulate new products from opportunities identified in the market, carrying out stability and performance studies, ensuring the scaling from laboratory, pilot plant, and production plant
- Ensure compliance with regulations applicable to the sector, being responsible for attending visits and audits of control entities.
- Train staff in OSH policies, waste treatment and management, and standards
✓ Implementation of quality laboratory in the production plant
✓ Construction of KPI’s related to production, quality, and environmental impact
✓ More than 95% compliance with INVIMA and external audits
profile_positions.title: R&D and Process responsible

profile_positions.description:
- Ensure technical service to customers and suppliers, regarding the creation and updating of necessary documentation (technical sheets, safety data sheets, support information)
- Perform cause analysis in complaints detected by consumer, through analysis performed in quality laboratory
- Process Risk matrix update
profile_positions.title: QSE Intern – Technical service

company.name: Grupo Bimbo
company.description:
NOURISHING A BETTER WORLD

With more than 145,000 associates in 34 countries , we are the biggest bakery in the world!

At Grupo Bimbo we are committed to work in a sustainable way for a better world and to generate economic development in 4 continents. We strive to improve the lifestyle of the communities where we have presence and to become good neighbors. We are investing in technology and innovation to reduce our environmental footprint.

*We value the person and foster a diversity and inclusion culture. 
*We operate in a responsible, efficient, productive and humane way, taking care of our environment. 
*We offer options for everyone and we promote healthy lifestyles.
